channel.title: Possibly client or server sided [PI]
channel.description:
I don't exactly know if this is client sided, or server sided. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Kgi78D.png[/img] Basically, everything works on this but the player doesn't show up :(
What could be the cause of this? ALSO: My equipment interface works perfectly fine :P

item.title: Possibly client or server sided [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:4, topic:528292”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=647039.msg4351314#msg4351314 date=1376687833]

Either you’re not loading any sprites or not made the button work server sided.

Right, because the player model is a sprite.

@OP: Has that interface been altered client-sided? It’s either that, or something is causing the packet that sends the player model to the interface to drop.

Not that I know of, I was messing around with my Equipment screen interface like 5 seconds ago. But I didn’t touch this interface.
[/quote]
Something you edited in the equipment interface probably passes on some id’s and such to that interface, my suggestion is to revert back, but keep both versions and compare to see if you can find what’s causing it so make this happen, so that you can keep your changes and fix your problem here.[/quote]
Nope, the only thing I was playing with was the spin algorithm. If it did mess with it, the character would be spinning

Read full topic

item.title: Possibly client or server sided [PI]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:528292”][quote author=MrSnow1 link=topic=647039.msg4351304#msg4351304 date=1376687002]
Either you’re not loading any sprites or not made the button work server sided.
[/quote]
Right, because the player model is a sprite.

@OP: Has that interface been altered client-sided? It’s either that, or something is causing the packet that sends the player model to the interface to drop.

Not that I know of, I was messing around with my Equipment screen interface like 5 seconds ago. But I didn’t touch this interface.[/quote]
Something you edited in the equipment interface probably passes on some id’s and such to that interface, my suggestion is to revert back, but keep both versions and compare to see if you can find what’s causing it so make this happen, so that you can keep your changes and fix your problem here.

Read full topic

4x4Chevrolet:

Not that I know of, I was messing around with my Equipment screen interface like 5 seconds ago. But I didn’t touch this interface.

Read full topic
